RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 5F Dirt CR: 75. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16500. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FAR FROM HOME dueled, won driving. MALPRACTICE MEUSER (GB) contested pace inside, second best. STUNNING HERO stalked leaders, held show. BALLOT BOX no threat. MR HARRY showed little. WHOOP GONE brief speed, tired. ALLABOUTTHEBEACH outrun. WALTER WHITE brushed at start, dueled,wilted.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since September 18 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LOVE TO ZOOM settled off leader, bid on turn, won driving. OLIVIA'S JOY rallied, second best. GALILEO'S AFFAIR rallied for show. ACT LIKE A LADY pressed pace, weakened. MIRACLE DRUG (IRE) no threat. MANHATTAN LADY outrun. BALI BALIFLY set pace, stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Love to Zoom
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off leader, bid on turn, driving

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 84. Claiming Purse 11300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE OCTOBER 18, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Claiming Races For $4,000 Not Considered In ELIGIBILITY).

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 2F Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (Winners At Two Furlongs in 2022-2023 To Carry An Additional 2 lbs. For Each Such Race Won).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GOLDEN NOLE dueled outside, won driving. CAN SHE SCOOT dueled gamely. PROMINENT HENNY broke sharp, battled inside, held show. RED ROCKET GIRL needed more late. IMMACULATE HEART inside, no threat. LOST ANCHOR showed little. TREASURED NIKKY outrun.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 80. Claiming Purse 8300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE OCTOBER 18, 2022. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 18 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SKYSCANNER rushed to the lead while five wide on the turn, won driving. SWITHER'S SHORTCUT dueled from the inside, battled gamely, held second. SUDDENLY SEDUCTIVE rallied wide. COLONEL MIKE dueled, weakened late. SOFIA'S SLUGGER pressed pace, tired. TOMMY TUESDAY no factor. ROLLIN ON TEQUILA led, stopped.
